website_summaries.verdict: Customers who are turned off by the feel of microfiber should consider this feminine towel. It feels softer on the skin than other microfiber towels and can double as a cover-up.
pros: Feels softer than other microfiber towels
Dries quickly, even in high humidity
Cool retro flower print in a choice of colors
cons: The hanging snap loop can break easily

customer_reviews.title: Pretty towel! Compact and absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a blue and purple one. The colors are very vibrant, so the white plumeria flowers stand out nicely. It's not a fluffy towel, no loops like a Terry cloth towel. But it is very absorbent. I actually bought them to dry off my Maltese dog after baths, but I'm keeping the purple one for myself. :-D
customer_reviews.author: S. Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect towel for traveling to beaches
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel! It portable for traveling and worked well on the beach. They are light and didn't take up much room in my suitcase and backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Big, compact towels!
customer_reviews.text: Big, compact towels ... great for the boat or beach since they take up very little room. We haven't used this towel that much and if I find an issue I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shep.

customer_reviews.title: Superb price value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 towels as part of a birthday gift for my daughter which included a weekend at a luxury beach hotel. She talked about the towels as much as the hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, quick dry, no odor and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size even for my 5 year old. He loves to get all wrapped up in his towel. It’s absorbent, dries fast, and no odor. We just used it on our week long camping trip and ate very happy with this towel!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it "drinks" up the water.
customer_reviews.author: Montana girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This towel looks great and folds to a perfect size to take travelling without sacrificing that all important suitcase space. Is light weight and dries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect, compact, lightweight and fast drying
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a week of using these on vacation in Grand Cayman. They are absolutely perfect and we took them every where. They are very lightweight and roll up to a very compact, small roll so they are super easy to take with you. No need for a huge bulky beach towel! The carry bag was a nice, unexpected bonus. Cannot recommend more highly.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: loved these light weight absorbent towels
customer_reviews.text: loved these light weight absorbent towels. we were pleasantly surprised how big they were! I carried two of them in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie r bailey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were more expensive & smaller than the extra large DB microfiber towels. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Kat 999

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I Love this towel. I have the purple which is bright and so cute and take it with me when I go on trips. It's a large size which makes it great for chilling at the beach, on the boat or even showering just it packs down to nearly nothing in my suitcase or backpack. Quick dry and it has a little corner strap for hanging to dry. You cannot go wrong with the towel.
customer_reviews.author: Brandye

customer_reviews.title: light weigh absorbent and pretty. roll up very small great for the beach or boat rides
customer_reviews.text: light weigh absorbent and pretty. roll up very small great for the beach or boat rides literally take a quarter of the space of a regular beach towel
customer_reviews.author: amw

customer_reviews.title: I love these towels so much I got one for everybody ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels so much I got one for everybody in my family for our trip to Belize! We snorkeled and swam a LOT so it was nice to have something so fast drying, absorbent and small for packing. Nice a big when you roll it out!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The towel is nice and big and drys well. It's just about getting used to the material feels wreid
customer_reviews.author: Melody Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: This towel rolls up into a small sack which is a great space saver in the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I ride my bike to the gym and back which is a 16 mile round trip. I have to carry all my swimming gear in my backpack. This towel rolls up into a small sack which is a great space saver in the backpack, not to mention very light weight! The towel absorbs the water well and was only damp by the time I was ready to head home! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I live in Kaua'i and always carry a beach towel in the car. These are great because they don't take up much space, dry quickly, sand doesn't stick to them & they dry my body quickly & efficiently. I also like the way they feel. I also bought some to put in our emergency preparedness kit (for tsunamis or hurricanes, should we have to evacuate quickly).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,light weight
customer_reviews.text: Gave my sister this for her birthday. She loves purple and hybicius. She love it
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda K Limmer
